marker.ph: /* Calculates a new player input with acceleration and deceleration. ... */
/* Works for both negative and positive directions, since pos already covers that for us. ... */
/* Bat will fly towards the player and "bounce" off. Could also slow down the movement. ... */
/* This script will handle weapon unlocks and inventory storage. ... */
/* (If any of these are left empty, the default effect will play.) ... */
